All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AcceptedActionMessage
This abstract class represents a generic accepted action message.
AcceptedChooseGoalCardMessage
This message is used to notify player that that his choice for private goal card has been accepted.
AcceptedColorMessage
This message is used to tell to player that server has accepted his color choice
AcceptedPickCardFromTable
This message is used by server to notify connected clients that a pick card from deck action has been accepted.
AcceptedPickCardMessage
This class is used by server to notify connected clients that someone has picked a card and this action has been accepted
AcceptedPlaceCardMessage
This abstract class represent a generic message sent by server to accept placing a card (initial or playable)
AcceptedPlaceInitialCard
This message is used by server to notify to all active game players that an initial card has been placed
AcceptedPlacePlayableCardMessage
This message is used by server to notify to clients that a "place card" of some player has been accepted
ActionMessage
This abstract class represents a generic message sent from client to server concerning player's action (e.g.placing a card or picking a card from deck)
ActionMessageVisitor
This interface is used for implementing Visitor design pattern
AllMessageVisitor
This interface represents a generic MessageToClientVisitor that can visit all messages sent by server to client
AnswerToActionMessage
This abstract class represents the generic answer to a player's action.
AnswerToActionMessageVisitor
Classes that need to visit AnswerToActionMessage must be implemented this interface.
AvailableColorsMessage
This message contains a list of available colors
AvailableGamesMessage
This message is used to tell player about available games that he can join
BeginFinalRoundMessage
This message is used to signal to all players connected to game that final round has to start
Card
This class represents a single card
CardImageLoader
This class is used to cache frequently used images for GUI, in order to reduce significantly the amount of memory required by the client application
CardNotFoundException
This exception is raised when no card has been found given the code
CardOrientation
This enum represent the two possible states of the card: UP or DOWN
CardSchema
Manages card schema of the Station.
Chat
This class is used for AF of chat.
ChatController
A sub-scene controller specialized in chat.
ChatListener
Classes that implement this interface are chat listeners (e.g.
ChosenColorMessage
This message is used when client wants to notify server that it has chosen its color
ChosenGoalCardMessage
This message is used by client to notify server that it has chosen his private goal card.
ClientApp
This is the main class for client.
ClientController
The class is used to forward the actions given by the user to the client network interface.
ClientFactory
This interface is used to implement factory method design pattern for client creation.
ClientHandler
This class represents the "network interface" with which server can communicate with one client both sending and receiving messages.
ClientHandlerRMI
This class is used server-side to represents a client that is connected to server using RMI.
ClientHandlerSocket
This class is used server-side to represents a client that is connected to server using TCP.
ClientHeartBeatMessage
This message is used by client to send heartbeat to server
ClientInterface
This empty interface represents a generic client that is configurable (extends ConfigurableClient), can interact using the network (extends NetworkManagementInterface) and can be used to play a game (extends GameManagementInterface).
ClientRMI
This class represents the RMI client interface.
ClientRMIFactory
Factory method for RMI client
ClientSettings
Setting for client
ClientState
This is an abstract class to represent the states of the Client in each moment of the game.
ClientTCP
This class represents the "network interface" of clients that use TCP for network communication.
ClientTCPFactory
Factory method for TCP client
CodexNaturalis
 
Color
This enum represents all possible colors
CommandParser
This record based class is used as parser for commands.
CommandType
This enum represents all the commands that have to be processed by CommandParser first and then ClientController.
ConfigurableClient
This interface must be implemented by all clients that need to be configurable (e.g. need to store in a file some configuration infos such as nickname, token...)
Configuration
This class represents the last valid configuration of the client interface.
Configuration.ConnectionType
Enum of connection type (RMI or TCP only)
ConfigurationManager
This class is used for managing configurations.
ConfigurationMessage
This abstract class represents a generic configuration message (e.g. cards and decks on table, players station after reconnection)
ConfigurationMessageVisitor
Classes that need to visit ConfigurationMessage must implement this interface
Corner
This interface represents the corner of a PlayableCard
CornerEffect
Represents an effect of type "corner".
CornerPosition
This enum represents the position inside the 2x2 matrix of the card
CreatedGameMessage
This message is used to tell that the game with the requested name has been successfully created
CreatedPlayerMessage
This message is used to confirm to client that his player object on server has been successfully created
CreateNewGameMessage
This message is used by player to ask server to create a new game with the specified name, number of and players and (maybe) a random seed
Deck<cardType>
 
Direction
This enum represents the possible movement direction
DirectionOfInitialCardMessage
This message is used by client to notify server that it wants to place the initial card in the specified direction
Disconnect
The client is currently disconnected from the game.
DisconnectedPlayerMessage
This message is used to tell to all connected players of the game that a player has disconnected
DisconnectFromGameMessage
This message is used to confirm to client that he has been disconnected from the game
DisconnectFromServerMessage
This message is used by server to notify client that it has been correctly disconnected by the server (e.g.
DisconnectMessage
This message is used when a client wants to disconnect explicitly from a game or the lobby.
EmptyCorner
This enum stands for an empty corner
EmptyDeckException
 
End
The game ended.
EndGameMessage
This message is used to tell to all active players that game has ended.
Error
This enum represents all possible errors concerning game and player management (such as duplicate nickname or invalid game name).
ErrorType
This enum represents all possible errors that can occur during GameState.PLAYING, GameState.END and GameState.SETUP
Game
This class represents a game session.
GameConfigurationMessage
This message is sent when server wants to update player about game configuration
GameController
This class is the controller of a single game.
GameEventsMessageVisitor
Classes that need to visit NotifyEventOnGame have to implement this interface
GameFinishedException
This exception is invoked when game finishes
GameHandlingErrorMessage
This message is used to tell player that an error concerning game (game name not valid, player name already in used...) has occurred
GameHandlingEvents
This enum represents all game handling possible update events (e.g. available games or game created)
GameHandlingListener
Classes that implement this interface are going to receive updates about game handling events
GameHandlingMessage
This abstract class represent a generic type of message regarding handling game, such as create a new game or join it.
GameHandlingMessage
This abstract class represents a generic game handling message (new player connected to game, player disconnected...)
GameHandlingMessageVisitor
This interface has to be implemented by all classes that want to visit messages of type GameHandlingMessage
GameHandlingMessageVisitor
Classes that need to visit GameHandlingMessage must implement this interface
GameManagementInterface
The interface is implemented by all clients independently by their connection type (RMI or TCP).
GamePausedMessage
This message is used to notify players that their game has paused
GameResumedMessage
This message is used to tell players of the game that game has resumed
GameSelectionController
 
GameState
This enum represents all possible game' states
GeneralListener
 
GoalCard
This class represents a single card
GoalCardButton
This class represents a generic button with a GoalCard as its graphic.
GoalEffect
 
GUIController
A generic controller for GUI.
GUISettings
Settings for GUI.
GUIView
 
HeartBeatManager
This class is used to manage both client-to-server and server-to-client heartbeats.
HeartBeatMessageVisitor
This interface must be implemented by classes that want to visit ClientHeartBeatMessage
HeartBeatMessageVisitor
 
ImportantConstants
Enum of important constants for model and controller
InvalidAnchorException
 
InvalidCardException
 
IPChecker
This utility class is used to check IP and ports
JoinedGameMessage
This message is used to notify player that he has correctly joined a game
JoinFirstAvailableGameMessage
This message is used by client to notify server that it wants to join the first available game
JoinGameMessage
This method is used by client to notify server that it wants to join the game with the specified name
JSONParser
This class is used for JSON file parsing
Listener
This is an empty interface that has to be implemented by classes that need to listen to specific events.
ListenersManager
This class manages listeners of other classes.
ListenerType
This enum represents all possible listener types.
LocalModel
The class is used by the client to save the information of the current game.
LocalModelEvents
This enum represents the possible events regarding LocalModel (e.g. new player connected to game or disconnected).
LocalModelListener
Classes that implements this interface are going to receive updates about LocalModel events.
LocalStationController
A sub-scene controller.
LocalStationPlayer
The class contains the information that represent the station of a player that the view can access.
LocalStationTabController
A sub-scene controller.
LocalTable
The class contains the table that the Client can access to pick card or be represented by its view.
LoginController
 
MainController
It the main controller of the server.
MainServerRMI
It's the main server for RMI.
MainServerTCP
This class is the TCP main server.
Message
 
MessageFactory
This class is responsible for distributing messages generated by model and controller to all listeners.
MessageHandler
This class is responsible for visiting all messages (excluding heartbeats) received from the network.
MessagePriorityLevel
This enum is used to represent different priority level of messages.
MessageToClient
This abstract class represents a generic message that server can send to client.
MessageToClientVisitor
This is an empty interface used to mark a class as a visitor for MessageToClient.
MessageToServer
This abstract class represents a generic message sent by client to server.It implements Serializable so that it can be transmitted with TCP
MessageToServerDispatcher
This class acts as a router for TCP messages from client to server.
MessageToServerVisitor
This is an empty interface used to mark a class as visitor of MessageToServer
NameAlreadyInUseException
 
NetworkError
This enum represents all possible error concerning network (such as reconnection not possible, or reconnection not necessary).
NetworkHandlingErrorMessage
With this message the server notifies to clients that a NetworkError has occurred while trying to perform an action.
NetworkHandlingErrorMessageVisitor
Classes that need to visit NetworkHandlingErrorMessage need to implement this interface
NetworkManagementInterface
This interface defines all methods, regarding network management, that outside "network interface" can be called.
NewConfigurationController
 
NewPlayerConnectedToGameMessage
This message is used to tell to players connected to game that a new player has connected
NewUserMessage
This message is used by client to tells server they would like to create a new player with the specified name.
NoCardException
 
NoConstraintEffect
Represents a pattern with no constraints.
NotAvailableCorner
This enum stands for a not available corner
NotGame
The client is connected to the server, but it is in no game.
NotifyChatMessage
This message is used by server to notify players that a new chat message has arrived
NotifyChatMessageVisitor
 
NotifyEventOnGame
This abstract class is used to notify a generic event concerning a game
NotPlayer
This state represent the moment a client opens the game and is not connected to the server.
ObservableMessageToClient<T>
 
ObservableMessageToServer<T>
 
ObserverMessageToClient<T>
 
ObserverMessageToServer<T>
 
OldConfigurationController
 
OtherAcceptedPickCardFromDeckMessage
This message is sent by server to all games players, different from who placed a card, to notify the updates of his station
OtherStation
The class represents a station of another player, whose nickname is different from the client.
OtherStationConfigurationMessage
This message is sent when player connects or reconnects to a certain game and needs to be updated about game and player state
OtherTurn
This state represent the moment a client is playing his game and another player is the active player.
OwnAcceptedPickCardFromDeckMessage
This message is sent by server to notify the player who placed a card about the updates in his station
OwnStationConfigurationMessage
This message is sent for updating a specified player about his own station after reconnection
PaneFireworks
The class was created following the public class found on GitHub for creating fireworks in JavaFX.
Particle
 
PatternEffect
Represents a constrained effect of type "pattern", such as "L-pattern" or "Diagonal-pattern"
Pause
Because all the other players in the game left, the game is in pause and therefore the client can't make any action in the game.
PersonalStation
The class contains the information of a personal station of a player.
Pick
The client can pick a card from one of the two decks or from one of the four cards in the table.
PickCardFromDeckMessage
This message is used by client to notify server that it wants to pick a card from deck
PickCardFromTableMessage
This message is used by client to notify server that it wants to pick a card from table
Place
The clients can place a card in its station.
PlaceCardMessage
This message is used by client to notify server that it wants to place a card in a certain direction from an anchor, and with a specified orientation
PlayableCard
This class represents a single playable card
PlayableCard.CardState
This interface is the state of a card, either up or down
PlayableCardButton
 
PlayableCardType
This enum represents all possible types of cards: RESOURCE, GOLD or INITIAL
PlayableEffect
 
Player
 
PlayerChatMessage
This message is used when player wants to send a message in the chat of its game
PlayerChatMessageVisitor
This interface is implemented by classes that want to visit messages of type PlayerChatMessage
PlayerCreationListener
Classes that implement this interface are going to receive updates about player creation events (e.g. errors or player effectivly created)
PlayerNotFoundException
 
PlayerReconnectedToGameMessage
This message is used to tell player that an inactive player has reconnected to game
PlayerSymbolsController
 
PlayingAreaController
A scene controller used to manage playing area scene.
Publisher
This is an abstract class used for implementing Publisher - Subscriber design pattern.
ReconnectionWaitController
A scene controller used to wait for reconnection and signaling to user that network problems have arisen.
ReconnectToServerMessage
This method is used by user to tell server it wants to reconnect to server.
RefusedActionMessage
This message is used when server needs to notify a player of an error occurred while performing a certain action (e.g. placing or picking card)
RequestAvailableGamesMessage
This message is used by client to ask server about available games.
RequestGameExitMessage
This message is used by client to request to server to leave the game where it was in.
SceneStatesEnum
Enumeration of all the (sub-) scene FXML locations.
ScoreboardController
The class represent a controller for the Scoreboard element in the GUI.
Server
This abstract class represents a generic server.
ServerApp
This class is used to start, run and close both MainServerTCP and MainServerRMI.
ServerHeartBeatMessage
This message is used by server to send heartbeat to client
ServerSettings
Server settings.
Setup
This class represents a state represents where a client is connected and is in a game currently ViewState.SETUP state.
SetupController
 
SetupEvent
This enum represents all possible updates type that can be received while in ViewState.SETUP
SetupListener
Classes that implement this interface are going to receive updates about setup phase
StartPlayingGameMessage
This message is used to tell to player that they can start to play their game
State
This enum represents the state of the players: active (connected with regular heartbeats) or inactive (probably not connected with no heartbeats for more than ServerSettings.MAX_DELTA_TIME_BETWEEN_HEARTBEATS).
StateListener
Classes that implement this interface are going to receive updates about ViewState events
Station
 
StationListener
Classes that implements this interface are going to receive updates about events regarding LocalStationPlayer
Symbol
This enums represents all possible symbols inside a corner
SymbolEffect
Represents an effect of type "symbol".
TableConfigurationMessage
 
TableController
A sub-scene controller.
TableListener
Classes that implement this interface are going to receive updates about events on LocalTable
TCPConnectionAcceptor
This class is used to accept new TCP connection from client.
Triplet<R,T,S>
This record represents a triplet
TUIView
The class manages the Textual User Interface (TUI) of the game.
TUIView.ShowState
Enumeration defining what the user is currently seeing: - NOT_PLAYING, the user sees the logo, the available colors and more
TUIView.StationInfos
Represents information related to a station, given the personal station of the player and a list of all the stations of the game.
Tuple<T,S>
 
TurnState
This enum represents all possible turn' state
TurnStateListener
Classes that implements this interface that turns are changed
TurnStateMessage
This message is used to update players about turn state
TurnStateMessageVisitor
 
UI
 
ViewState
This enum represents all possible states of FSM describing ClientController
VirtualClient
This interface represents the remote client seen by server.
VirtualGameServer
This is the remote interface seen by clients of the game server.
VirtualMainServer
This interface represents the remote interface of the MainServerRMI.
Wait
This class represents a state where client is waiting for a message from the server to continue playing.
